Submodules¶

LegoBTLE.LegoWP.common_message_header module¶

LegoBTLE.LegoWP.common_message_header¶

The dataclass COMMON_MESSAGE_HEADER models the common part for all messages comming from the hub brick.

See also

LEGO(c) Wireless Protocol 3.0.00r17

class LegoBTLE.LegoWP.common_message_header.COMMON_MESSAGE_HEADER(data: bytearray)[source]¶

Bases: object

This dataclass models the header information common to all Lego(c) messages.

For a description of the Common Message Header, LEGO(c) Wireless Protocol 3.0.00r17.

The length information is added when the actual message is assembled.

LegoBTLE.LegoWP.types module¶

LegoBTLE.LegoWP.types¶

Classes in this :module: are modeling the various types of information that the hub brick either sends or receives.

Members¶

DEVICE_TYPE
Models which type of device is connected to a port, c.f. IO_TYPES:.
MESSAGE_TYPE
Models the type of message, e.g., UPS_DNS_HUB_ALERT indicates a Hub Alert Message and is used for upstream and downstream communication.
HUB_ALERT_TYPE
Models the various alerts that can occur.
HUB_ALERT_OP
Models how Alerts reach the consumer.

class LegoBTLE.LegoWP.types.DEVICE_TYPE[source]¶

The various device types the LEGO(c) system can handle.

For a description of the fields consult the LEGO(c) Wireless Protocol 3.0.00r17

class LegoBTLE.LegoWP.types.MESSAGE_TYPE[source]¶

Bases: object

This :dataclass: models the various message types that can occur.

A prefix UPS_DNS hints that messages of this type can be used upstream and downstream. Whereas UPS or DNS hint to upstream, downstream (resp.) usage.

A detailed decription is available under MESSAGE_TYPES.

DNS_PORT_CMD = b'\x81'¶
DNS_PORT_NOTIFICATION = b'A'¶
DNS_VIRTUAL_PORT_SETUP = b'a'¶
UPS_DNS_EXT_SERVER_CMD = b'\\'¶
UPS_DNS_GENERAL_HUB_NOTIFICATIONS = b'\x01'¶
UPS_DNS_HUB_ACTION = b'\x02'¶
UPS_DNS_HUB_ALERT = b'\x03'¶
UPS_HUB_ATTACHED_IO = b'\x04'¶
UPS_HUB_GENERIC_ERROR = b'\x05'¶
UPS_PORT_CMD_FEEDBACK = b'\x82'¶
UPS_PORT_NOTIFICATION = b'G'¶
UPS_PORT_VALUE = b'E'¶

LegoBTLE.LegoWP.types.key_name(cls, value: bytearray)[source]¶

Module contents¶

Modules in this package implement the greater part of the LEGO(c) Wireless Protocol 3.0.00r17.

LegoBTLE.LegoWP¶

Everything that has to do with the LEGO(c) Wireless Protocol 3.0.00r17.

LegoBTLE
